name: cpython
description: Native bindings to run python in its native interpreter.

scripts.posttest: (istanbul check-coverage --statements 80 --branches 65 --functions 55 --lines 80 && rm -rf coverage) || echo Look at 'coverage/lcov-report/index.html' to find out more
scripts.docs: jsdoc2md lib/node-cpython.js > docs/API.md && node -e "var fs = require('fs');fs.writeFile('README.md', fs.readFileSync('docs/README.md'));['docs/README.md', 'docs/API.md', 'docs/LICENSE.md'].forEach(function(el){fs.appendFileSync('README.md',fs.readFileSync(el))})"

author: Robert Jefe Lindst√§dt <robert.lindstaedt@gmail.com>
